location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 7/15 British Overseas Airways Corporation [BOAC] - Customs Exemption'

physicalDescription.extent: This file is arranged approximately in chronological order.

Foliation: The foliation sequence runs from the first page following the front cover until the back cover of the page. It appears in pencil in the top right corner of the folio.Condition: Text missing on folio 1 due to tear.

mods.abstract: This file contains correspondence between Major Tom Hickinbotham, Political Agent at Bahrain; Lieutenant-Colonel Charles Geoffrey Prior, Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bahrain; Charles Dalrymple Belgrave, Adviser to the Bahrain Government; G H C Lee, Assistant Regional Director, British Overseas Airways Corporation (BOAC), Karachi. The correspondence concerns customs exemptions for BOAC stores and equipment imported into Bahrain. Details of the First, Second and Third Civil Air Agreements (1934, 1938 and 1941 respectively) appear in the Office Notes (f. 11).
